Package test

Class TestListener

java.lang.Object
test.TestListener
public class TestListener extends Object
Creates a game panel for testing and simulates keyboard actions to test unit/edge cases

    • genEvent

      public Point genEvent(int called)
      Parameters:
      called - Uses keyboard events to simulate player movement
      Returns:
      returns a new point if the game is not paused and not over
